metadata.description: The Marrowbone has been immobilized and Victor MacLimpet is feeling glum: a pirate without a ship is a pirate without a job. Just as he hits rock bottom, Victor gets a very bad idea... He'll wreck a galleon and steal its cargo. Perfect! Except that the "loot" in question will sow discord within the "Pirate Family" and all over Turtle Island...
metadata.name: Pirate Family
